At September 30, 2020 and December 31, 2019 we did	no	t have any derivatives that were classified as Level 1 (valued using quoted prices in active markets for identical assets) or Level 3 (valued using significant unobservable inputs).	39	Table of Contents	UNITED PARCEL SERVICE, INC.
